items.title: This International Whisky Giant Is Closing One of It’s Facilities for Scotch
items.description: The company reported a pause in production, but one source warns of a likely extended closure.

items.title: If Nvidia Stumbles, Pay Attention to Apple
items.description: Nvidia’s stock market performance this week is a crack in the data center premise. Edge compute just might burst the buildout bubble.

items.title: Despite Being Sued by Nearly Every Record Label, This AI Startup Just Hit a $2.45 Billion Valuation
items.description: Suno is a platform for AI music generation. It just raised $250 million in its series C round.

items.title: Scott Galloway Expects Market Crash Within a Year. Here’s What to Buy
items.description: The entrepreneur and NYU Stern Marketing professor predicts a critical correction that could cut the Magnificent 7 in half.

items.title: Sotheby’s Tried to Auction a $10 Million Golden Toilet—It Got Awkward Fast
items.description: The artist behind the duct tape banana just had his golden throne taken to Sotheby’s.
